ModMetaData.name: BatteriesStuffed
ModMetaData.author: Skullywag
ModMetaData.description:
Changes vanilla batteries so that they can be made with stuff.
Storage Efficiency Beauty Fires Health Explodes Steel battery: 1000 50% -15 yes 100 yes Silver battery: 1000 70% +5 yes 125 yes Gold battery: 2500 80% +10 yes 150 yes Plasteel battery: 1500 90% -10 no 250 no Uranium battery: 2000 100% -20 no 200 no
